flavor: None of your history books mention me?" laughed Daria. "They will now.
name: Aura Blast
text:
Destroy target enchantment.
Draw a card.
title: Aura Blast

flavor: Though a fierce fighter, its true value is that it inspires beleaguered forces.
name: Aurora Griffin
text:
Flying
{W}: Target permanent becomes white until end of turn.
title: Aurora Griffin

flavor: When no birds are available, Kangee's disciples fill the sky with anything that‘s willing to fight.
name: Disciple of Kangee
text: {U}, {T}: Target creature gains flying and becomes blue until end of turn.
title: Disciple of Kangee

name: Dominaria's Judgment
text: Until end of turn, creatures you control gain protection from white if you control a Plains, from blue if you control an Island, from black if you control a Swamp, from red if you control a Mountain, and from green if you control a Forest.
title: Dominaria's Judgment

flavor:
A good guard is alert. A great guard is also loyal."
—Benalish kennelmaster
name: Guard Dogs
text: {2}{W}, {T}: Choose a permanent you control. Prevent all combat damage target creature would deal this turn if it shares a color with that permanent.
title: Guard Dogs

flavor:
Wear courage as your armor. Wield honor as your blade."
—Gerrard
name: Heroic Defiance
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 unless it shares a color with the most common color among all permanents or a color tied for most common.
title: Heroic Defiance

name: Hobble
text:
Enchant creature
When Hobble enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted creature can't attack.
Enchanted creature can't block if it's black.
title: Hobble

flavor: I've faced your kind before. This time I'm ready for you.
name: Honorable Scout
text: When Honorable Scout enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life for each black and/or red creature target opponent controls.
title: Honorable Scout

name: Lashknife Barrier
text:
When Lashknife Barrier enters the battlefield, draw a card.
If a source would deal damage to a creature you control, it deals that much damage minus 1 to that creature instead.
title: Lashknife Barrier

name: March of Souls
text: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated. For each creature destroyed this way, its controller puts a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying onto the battlefield.
title: March of Souls

name: Orim's Chant
text:
Kicker {W} (You may pay an additional {W} as you cast this spell.)
Target player can't cast spells this turn.
If Orim's Chant was kicked, creatures can't attack this turn.
title: Orim's Chant

flavor:
I enjoy a good joke as much as the next guy."
—Commodore Guff
name: Planeswalker's Mirth
text: {3}{W}: Target opponent reveals a card at random from his or her hand. You gain life equal to that card's converted mana cost.
title: Planeswalker's Mirth

name: Pollen Remedy
text:
Kicker—Sacrifice a land. (You may sacrifice a land in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell.)
Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt this turn to any number of target creatures and/or players, divided as you choose. If Pollen Remedy was kicked, prevent the next 6 damage this way instead.
title: Pollen Remedy

name: Samite Elder
text: {T}: Creatures you control gain protection from the colors of target permanent you control until end of turn.
title: Samite Elder

name: Samite Pilgrim
text: Domain — {T}: Prevent the next X damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control.
title: Samite Pilgrim

name: Sunscape Battlemage
text:
Kicker {1}{G} and/or {2}{U} (You may pay an additional {1}{G} and/or {2}{U} as you cast this spell.)
When Sunscape Battlemage enters the battlefield, if it was kicked with its {1}{G} kicker, destroy target creature with flying.
When Sunscape Battlemage enters the battlefield, if it was kicked with its {2}{U} kicker, draw two cards.
title: Sunscape Battlemage

flavor: The spirits of fallen battlemages can serve their guilds as familiars by joining with any physical form.
name: Sunscape Familiar
text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Green spells and blue spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
title: Sunscape Familiar

name: Surprise Deployment
text:
Cast Surprise Deployment only during combat.
You may put a nonwhite creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. At the beginning of the next end step, return that creature to your hand. (Return it only if it's on the battlefield.)
title: Surprise Deployment

name: Voice of All
text:
Flying
As Voice of All enters the battlefield, choose a color.
Voice of All has protection from the chosen color.
title: Voice of All

flavor: Each commander looked at the others and wondered who would be first to break the alliance.
name: Allied Strategies
text: Domain — Target player draws a card for each basic land type among lands he or she controls.
title: Allied Strategies

name: Arctic Merfolk
text:
Kicker—Return a creature you control to its owner's hand. (You may return a creature you control to its owner's hand in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell.)
If Arctic Merfolk was kicked, it enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.
title: Arctic Merfolk

flavor: Did I know Szat would betray us?" Urza asked quizzically. "I was counting on it.
name: Confound
text:
Counter target spell that targets one or more creatures.
Draw a card.
title: Confound

name: Dralnu's Pet
text:
Kicker—{2}{B}, Discard a creature card. (You may pay {2}{B} and discard a creature card in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell.)
If Dralnu's Pet was kicked, it enters the battlefield with flying and with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the discarded card's converted mana cost.
title: Dralnu's Pet

flavor: Don't worry, Gerrard," said Ertai. "I'm sure the crew will come to your rescue as quickly as they came to mine.
name: Ertai's Trickery
text: Counter target spell if it was kicked.
title: Ertai's Trickery

flavor:
I'll get you to safety—or whatever passes for safety these days."
—Urborg ferry pilot
name: Escape Routes
text: {2}{U}: Return target white or black creature you control to its owner's hand.
title: Escape Routes

flavor:
I'd be happy to stop contradicting you, Urza, just as soon as you start being right."
—Bo Levar, planeswalker
name: Gainsay
text: Counter target blue spell.
title: Gainsay

flavor: Even the fiercest beast will flee when faced with the possibility of becoming dinner.

text:
Flying
When Hunting Drake enters the battlefield, put target red or green creature on top of its owner's library.

flavor: The Phyrexians don't want to conquer Dominaria. They want to remake it.
name: Planar Overlay
text: Each player chooses a land he or she controls of each basic land type. Return those lands to their owners' hands.

name: Planeswalker's Mischief
text: {3}{U}: Target opponent reveals a card at random from his or her hand. If it's an instant or sorcery card, exile it. You may cast it without paying its mana cost for as long as it remains exiled. (If it has X in its mana cost, X is 0.) At the beginning of the next end step, if you haven't cast it, return it to its owner's hand. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
title: Planeswalker's Mischief

name: Rushing River
text:
Kicker—Sacrifice a land. (You may sacrifice a land in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell.)
Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. If Rushing River was kicked, return another target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.

flavor: It always has the home-turf advantage.
name: Sea Snidd
text: {T}: Target land becomes the basic land type of your choice until end of turn.

Master the sky and you rule everything beneath it.
—Metathran saying

text:
As Shifting Sky enters the battlefield, choose a color.
All nonland permanents are the chosen color.

Enchant creature

Enchant creature

Flying

Kicker {U} (You may pay an additional {U} as you cast this spell.)

text:
Kicker—Sacrifice two lands. (You may sacrifice two lands in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell.)
Target player discards two cards. If Bog Down was kicked, that player discards three cards instead.
title: Bog Down

flavor:
After four thousand years, you learn to plan for betrayal."
—Urza

text: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, that player loses X life, where X is the number of cards in that player's hand minus the number of cards in your hand.

flavor: There's no higher honor in Phyrexia than dying for Yawgmoth's glorious vision.

text:
As an additional cost to cast Death Bomb, sacrifice a creature.
Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated. Its controller loses 2 life.

text:
As an additional cost to cast Diabolic Intent, sacrifice a creature.
Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

flavor:
Do not fear death. I shall release you from the eternal bonds and bring you glory."
—Lord Dralnu
name: Exotic Disease
text: Domain — Target player loses X life and you gain X life, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control.

I confer with Death itself. What could you possibly do to injure me?"
—Lord Dralnu

text:
Other Zombie creatures get +1/+1.
{1}{B}, {T}: Return target Zombie card from your graveyard to your hand.

The mere sight of our undead allies sickens me. What unholy bargain have you struck?"
—Grizzlegom, to Agnate

The toads of Urborg aren't fast, powerful, or pleasant, but they have their uses."

When Nightscape Battlemage enters the battlefield, if it was kicked with its {2}{R} kicker, destroy target land.

For dim-witted, thick-skulled genetic mutants, they have pretty good aim."

text: Each player hides at least one item, then all players reveal them simultaneously. Each player loses life equal to the number of items he or she revealed. The player who revealed the fewest items then loses half his or her life, rounded up. If two or more players are tied for fewest, each loses half his or her life, rounded up.

Sacrificing mortal dragons to satisfy your immortal hunger ends here."

text:

Prevent all combat damage target creature would deal this turn. If Falling Timber was kicked, prevent all combat damage another target creature would deal this turn.

flavor: I bring word from Gaea. Fight on! She will never allow her children to die alone.

Enchant creature

name: Malicious Advice
text: Tap X target artifacts, creatures, and/or lands. You lose X life.
title: Malicious Advice

name: Marsh Crocodile
text:
When Marsh Crocodile enters the battlefield, return a blue or black creature you control to its owner's hand.
When Marsh Crocodile enters the battlefield, each player discards a card.
title: Marsh Crocodile

flavor: Meddling mages chant so loudly that no one can get a spell in edgewise.
name: Meddling Mage
text:
As Meddling Mage enters the battlefield, name a nonland card.
The named card can't be cast.
title: Meddling Mage

name: Natural Emergence
text:
When Natural Emergence enters the battlefield, return a red or green enchantment you control to its owner's hand.
Lands you control are 2/2 creatures with first strike. They're still lands.
title: Natural Emergence

flavor:
He is Yawgmoth's reward to me. I shall kill him a hundred times a day."
—Crovax, to Ertai
name: Phyrexian Tyranny
text: Whenever a player draws a card, that player loses 2 life unless he or she pays {2}.
title: Phyrexian Tyranny

name: Questing Phelddagrif
text:
{G}: Questing Phelddagrif gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Target opponent puts a 1/1 green Hippo creature token onto the battlefield.
{W}: Questing Phelddagrif gains protection from black and from red until end of turn. Target opponent gains 2 life.
{U}: Questing Phelddagrif gains flying until end of turn. Target opponent may draw a card.
title: Questing Phelddagrif

flavor: When angered or frightened, it protects itself with a burst of blinding light.
name: Radiant Kavu
text: {R}{G}{W}: Prevent all combat damage blue creatures and black creatures would deal this turn.
title: Radiant Kavu

name: Razing Snidd
text:
When Razing Snidd enters the battlefield, return a black or red creature you control to its owner's hand.
When Razing Snidd enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a land.
title: Razing Snidd

name: Rith's Charm
text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target nonbasic land.
• Put three 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens onto the battlefield.
• Prevent all damage a source of your choice would deal this turn.
title: Rith's Charm

name: Sawtooth Loon
text:
Flying
When Sawtooth Loon enters the battlefield, return a white or blue creature you control to its owner's hand.
When Sawtooth Loon enters the battlefield, draw two cards, then put two cards from your hand on the bottom of your library.
title: Sawtooth Loon

name: Shivan Wurm
text:
Trample
When Shivan Wurm enters the battlefield, return a red or green creature you control to its owner's hand.
title: Shivan Wurm

name: Silver Drake
text:
Flying
When Silver Drake enters the battlefield, return a white or blue creature you control to its owner's hand.
title: Silver Drake

name: Sparkcaster
text:
When Sparkcaster enters the battlefield, return a red or green creature you control to its owner's hand.
When Sparkcaster enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to target player.
title: Sparkcaster

name: Steel Leaf Paladin
text:
First strike
When Steel Leaf Paladin enters the battlefield, return a green or white creature you control to its owner's hand.
title: Steel Leaf Paladin

flavor: Like his mother before him, Darigaaz gave his life defending Dominaria from the tyranny of self-styled "gods.
name: Terminate
text: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.
title: Terminate

name: Treva's Charm
text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target enchantment.
• Exile target attacking creature.
• Draw a card, then discard a card.
title: Treva's Charm

flavor: Deep in Yawgmoth's realm, Urza stopped dead in his tracks and rubbed his soot-filled eyes. "Mishra?
name: Urza's Guilt
text: Each player draws two cards, then discards three cards, then loses 4 life.
title: Urza's Guilt

name: Draco
text:
Domain — Draco costs {2} less to cast for each basic land type among lands you control.
Flying
Domain — At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Draco unless you pay {10}. This cost is reduced by {2} for each basic land type among lands you control.
title: Draco

flavor: Overflowing with visions of the possible future, it lends power to those in the present.
name: Mana Cylix
text: {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
title: Mana Cylix

name: Skyship Weatherlight
text:
When Skyship Weatherlight enters the battlefield, search your library for any number of artifact and/or creature cards and exile them. Then shuffle your library.
{4}, {T}: Choose a card at random that was exiled with Skyship Weatherlight. Put that card into its owner's hand.
title: Skyship Weatherlight

flavor: It doesn't point north. It points home.
name: Star Compass
text:
Star Compass enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add to your mana pool one mana of any color that a basic land you control could produce.
title: Star Compass

flavor: Designed like the gargadons of Keld—big and brutal.
name: Stratadon
text:
Domain — Stratadon costs {1} less to cast for each basic land type among lands you control.
Trample
title: Stratadon

name: Crosis's Catacombs
text:
When Crosis's Catacombs enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return a non-Lair land you control to its owner's hand.
{T}: Add {U}, {B}, or {R} to your mana pool.
title: Crosis's Catacombs

name: Darigaaz's Caldera
text:
When Darigaaz's Caldera enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return a non-Lair land you control to its owner's hand.
{T}: Add {B}, {R}, or {G} to your mana pool.
title: Darigaaz's Caldera

name: Dromar's Cavern
text:
When Dromar's Cavern enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return a non-Lair land you control to its owner's hand.
{T}: Add {W}, {U}, or {B} to your mana pool.
title: Dromar's Cavern

name: Forsaken City
text:
Forsaken City doesn't untap during your untap step.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may exile a card from your hand. If you do, untap Forsaken City.
{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
title: Forsaken City

flavor: Legend has it that meteor craters are haunted by the ghosts of those who died on impact.
name: Meteor Crater
text: {T}: Choose a color of a permanent you control. Add one mana of that color to your mana pool.
title: Meteor Crater

name: Rith's Grove
text:
When Rith's Grove enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return a non-Lair land you control to its owner's hand.
{T}: Add {R}, {G}, or {W} to your mana pool.
title: Rith's Grove

name: Terminal Moraine
text:
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Terminal Moraine: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
title: Terminal Moraine

name: Treva's Ruins
text:
When Treva's Ruins enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return a non-Lair land you control to its owner's hand.
{T}: Add {G}, {W}, or {U} to your mana pool.
title: Treva's Ruins

name: Tahngarth, Talruum Hero
text:
Vigilance
{1}{R}, {T}: Tahngarth, Talruum Hero deals damage equal to its power to target creature. That creature deals damage equal to its power to Tahngarth.
title: Tahngarth, Talruum Hero

flavor: Altered by Phyrexian science, corrupted by black mana, and twisted by rage, Ertai still looked in the mirror and saw only glory.
name: Ertai, the Corrupted
text: {U}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature or enchantment: Counter target spell.
title: Ertai, the Corrupted

name: Skyship Weatherlight
text:
When Skyship Weatherlight enters the battlefield, search your library for any number of artifact and/or creature cards and exile them. Then shuffle your library.
{4}, {T}: Choose a card at random that was exiled with Skyship Weatherlight. Put that card into its owner's hand.
title: Skyship Weatherlight
